participant_1.background:
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
i enjoy running.
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
i love to sew.
i have allergies.

participant_2.background:
My feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.
my hair is colored purple.
I have a dice collection that my parents would think is childish.
I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.

content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do for fun?
I love running long distances, but my feet get sore after a while.
I love running too! Do you have a favorite place to run?
I like running along the beach. The ocean water feels great on my skin.
That sounds amazing! I love the beach. Do you live near the ocean?
I live in a big city, but I go back to my hometown to take care of my parents. My hometown is right on the ocean.
That's so sweet of you to take care of your parents. I'm sure they appreciate it.
They do. I'm glad I can be there for them.
I'm sure you're a great daughter.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to sew. I make clothes, bags, and other things.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
